languages.text: "Слушаю и думаю — и за что же они нас так ненавидели, таких добряков?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"
languages.original_text: "Слушаю и думаю — и за что же они нас так ненавидели, таких добряков?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate kindly souls such as us, I wonder?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate kindly souls such as us, I wonder?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"
"Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

languages.text: "Oh, was können sie nur für einen Grund gehabt haben, solch gütige Seelen zu hassen, frage ich mich?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, was können sie nur für einen Grund gehabt haben, solch gütige Seelen zu hassen, frage ich mich?"

languages.text: « Franchement, c'est à se demander quelle raison ils pouvaient bien avoir de haïr des âmes aussi charitables que nous ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

traits.locale_text: « Franchement, c'est à se demander quelle raison ils pouvaient bien avoir de haïr des âmes aussi charitables que nous ! »

languages.text: «Ay, me pregunto por qué motivo nos tendrán inquina, con lo amables que somos».
languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

traits.locale_text: «Ay, me pregunto por qué motivo nos tendrán inquina, con lo amables que somos».

languages.text: 「ああ、彼らはなぜ私たちのような親切な者たちを憎む必要があるの？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、彼らはなぜ私たちのような親切な者たちを憎む必要があるの？」

languages.text: “噢，我真不明白，他们为什么一定要憎恨像我们这么善良的人呢？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，我真不明白，他们为什么一定要憎恨像我们这么善良的人呢？”

languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"

languages.text: "Bizim gibi nazik kimselerden nefret etmek için ne sebepleri olabileceğini merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Oh, what possible reason could they have had to hate such kindly souls as us, I wonder?"
